completed_steps.summary: Classified as multi-part with 3 parts: avatary (backend), callCenter (backend), frontend (web)
Resumed from step_2, reviewed existing documentation, user chose to finalize as-is
Workflow finalized - implementation-focused documentation sufficient for project needs

findings.documentation_approach: Implementation-focused guides for Call Center setup and multi-assistant routing

project_types.description: Python backend with LiveKit and Tavus for video avatar calls
FastAPI backend with OpenAI multi-assistant system (Reception, Sales, Complaints)
Next.js/React frontend serving both avatar and call center interfaces

summary: Multi-part project with avatary (video backend), callCenter (audio multi-assistant backend), and frontend (shared Next.js). Implementation-focused documentation created: configuration analysis, implementation guide, sentiment-based routing, and master index. Documentation emphasizes making callCenter work like avatary with multi-assistant support.
